items.sentence: Tom and Mary both work about forty-five hours a week.
I didn\'t realize that I needed to be here yesterday.
I didn\'t think the house would burn down so quickly.
I don\'t ever want Tom to write to my daughter again.
I figured you\'d probably never want to see me again.
The waiter came over to take away Tom\'s empty plate.
Tom doesn\'t like drinking coffee out of a paper cup.
No matter how rich people are, they always want more.
The coat that she said she wanted was very expensive.
Why didn\'t you tell me you were allergic to peanuts?
